The picture posted by Nigerian singer an: 2020, showing anti-graft czar Magu in a jail cell.
The caption used on Twitter and Facebook: implying that Magu is behind bars for money laundering and fraud.
Reports from Nigerian media on July 6: 2020, stating that secret police had arrested Magu, which was later denied by the EFCC in a statement.
The verification through reverse image s: which revealed that the picture was digitally manipulated, replacing the model's head with Magu's.
